languages.text:
В журнале появились свежие контракты.
Контракты — это задания ваших колоний, за выполнение которых можно получить в награду ресурсы, {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактор прибыли{/g} или уникальные предметы. Иногда выполнение контрактов одной колонии может повлиять на эффективность других ваших колоний.
Через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} перейдите в журнал и выберите раздел "Контракты", нажимая {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
В журнале появились свежие контракты.
Контракты — это задания ваших колоний, за выполнение которых можно получить в награду ресурсы, {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}фактор прибыли{/g} или уникальные предметы. Иногда выполнение контрактов одной колонии может повлиять на эффективность других ваших колоний.
Через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} перейдите в журнал и выберите раздел "Контракты", нажимая {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your profit factor, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your profit factor, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your profit factor, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick-access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

languages.text:
¡Hay nuevos contratos disponibles en el diario!
Los contratos son solicitudes enviadas por tus colonias. Al completarlos, puedes obtener recursos, aumentar tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}factor de beneficio{/g} o recibir objetos únicos. A veces completar los contratos de una colonia puede afectar a la productividad de las otras.
Desde el acceso rápido, {console_bind|RightBottom}, abre el diario y accede a la sección de contratos con {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Hay nuevos contratos disponibles en el diario!
Los contratos son solicitudes enviadas por tus colonias. Al completarlos, puedes obtener recursos, aumentar tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} o recibir objetos únicos. A veces completar los contratos de una colonia puede afectar a la productividad de las otras.
Desde el acceso rápido, {console_bind|RightBottom}, abre el diario y accede a la sección de contratos con {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

languages.text:
日誌の新しい契約が利用可能になった！
契約はコロニーからの要請だ。達成すると資源を手に入れたり、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利益因子{/g}を上げたり、ユニークなアイテムをもらえる。あるコロニーから提示された契約を履行することで、他のコロニーの生産性に影響が出ることもある。
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から日誌を開き、{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}を押して契約セクションを選択しよう。
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
日誌の新しい契約が利用可能になった！
契約はコロニーからの要請だ。達成すると資源を手に入れたり、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益率{/g}を上げたり、ユニークなアイテムをもらえる。あるコロニーから提示された契約を履行することで、他のコロニーの生産性に影響が出ることもある。
クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から日誌を開き、{console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}を押して契約セクションを選択する。

languages.text:
您可以在日志中查看新的合约了！
合约代表您的殖民地发出的请求。完成合约之后，您可以获得资源，提高{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}利润因子{/g}，或获得独一无二的物品。有些时候，完成某个殖民地的合约后，还会提高其他殖民地的生产能力。
您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}来打开日志，之后按下{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}来查看合约。
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
您可以在日志中查看新的合约了！
合约代表您的殖民地发出的请求。完成合约之后，您可以获得资源，提高{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}，或获得独一无二的物品。有些时候，完成某个殖民地的合约后，还会提高其他殖民地的生产能力。
您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}来打开日志，之后按下{console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}来查看合约。

languages.text:
Verträge sind Aufträge, die von deinen Kolonien erteilt werden. Wenn du sie erfüllst, kannst du Ressourcen erhalten, deinen {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}Profitfaktor{/g} erhöhen oder einzigartige Gegenstände erhalten. Manchmal kann die Erfüllung von Verträgen, die von einer Kolonie angeboten werden, die Produktivität deiner anderen Kolonien beeinflussen.
Über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} öffnest du das Tagebuch und wählst den Abschnitt Verträge, indem du {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} drückst.
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
Verträge sind Aufträge, die von deinen Kolonien erteilt werden. Wenn du sie erfüllst, kannst du Ressourcen erhalten, deinen {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktor{/g} erhöhen oder einzigartige Gegenstände erhalten. Manchmal kann die Erfüllung von Verträgen, die von einer Kolonie angeboten werden, die Produktivität deiner anderen Kolonien beeinflussen.
Über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} öffnest du das Tagebuch und wählst den Abschnitt Verträge, indem du {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop} drückst.

languages.text:
De nouveaux contrats sont maintenant disponibles dans le journal !
Les contrats correspondent à des demandes émises par vos colonies. En les menant à bien, vous pouvez obtenir des ressources, augmenter votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} ou recevoir des objets uniques. Parfois, l'exécution des contrats proposés par une colonie peut affecter la productivité de vos autres colonies.
Depuis l'accès rapide, {console_bind|RightBottom}, ouvrez le journal et sélectionnez la section Contrats en appuyant sur {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
De nouveaux contrats sont maintenant disponibles dans le journal !
Les contrats correspondent à des demandes émises par vos colonies. En les menant à bien, vous pouvez obtenir des ressources, augmenter votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}facteur d'influence{/g} ou recevoir des objets uniques. Parfois, l'exécution des contrats proposés par une colonie peut affecter la productivité de vos autres colonies.
Depuis l'accès rapide, {console_bind|RightBottom}, ouvrez le journal et sélectionnez la section Contrats en appuyant sur {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

languages.text:
Seyir defterinde yeni kontratlar mevcut!
Kontratlar kolonilerinin yaptığı taleplerdir. Onları tamamlayarak kaynak elde edebilir, {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}kâr faktörünü{/g} artırabilir veya eşsiz eşyalar kazanabilirsin. Kimi zaman bir koloninin çıkardığı kontratı tamamlamak diğer kolonilerinin üretkenliğini etkileyebilir.
Hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} seyir defterini aç ve {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} düğmelerine basarak Kontratlar bölümünü seç.
languages.original_text:
New contracts are now available in the journal!
Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
From quick access, {console_bind|RightBottom}, open the journal and select the Contracts section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
